message: I'm feeling generous!  Take 10, and let's get this over with.
Meet me halfway, let's settle this quickly!
I'm willing to budge a bit, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.  Let's make a deal.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'll try to be fair. This is my last generous offer!
This is my final offer. If we don't reach an agreement now, we risk losing a lot more in the next round. Let's be reasonable.
I'm not going to get any more generous. Take it or leave it!
